name: Milky Way Galaxy
description: This is the galaxy containing the Sun and its Solar System, and therefore Earth.

name: Canis Major Dwarf
description: Some astronomers believe that it is a dwarf galaxy in the process of being pulled apart by the gravitational field of the more massive Milky Way galaxy.

name: Andromeda
description: It is expected to collide with the Milky Way galaxy in around 4â€“5 billion years, merging to form a giant elliptical galaxy or a large lenticular galaxy.

name: Sagittarius Dwarf Elliptical Galaxy
description: The dissipation of this galaxy's main cluster and its merger with the Milky Way stream is expected to be complete within a billion years from now.

name: Large Magellanic Cloud
description: Largest satellite galaxy of the Milky Way

name: Small Magellanic Cloud
description: Astronomers speculate that it was once a barred spiral galaxy that was disrupted by the Milky Way to become somewhat irregular.
